meanings.sent1: I found a shiny byzant on the ground.

meanings.definition: Intricate or complex in design or structure.
meanings.sent1: The byzant pattern on the rug was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was full of byzant details.
meanings.sent3: The byzant maze in the garden confused the visitors.

meanings.sent5: The byzant clock was a marvel of craftsmanship and precision.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Byzantine Empire.
meanings.sent1: The historian studied the byzant artifacts from the empire.
meanings.sent2: The byzant architecture of the church was breathtaking.
